item.title: Contact
item.description: You can email me at sam.worley15 [at] utexas [dot] edu Or follow me at @worles9

About Sam Worley I am a currently pursuing a M.S. in Business Analytics in the McCombs School of Business at the University of Texas at Austin. My undergrad studies included a major of Management of Information Systems with a minor in Marketing and an Elements of Computing Certificate. I’m passionate about using data to gain a better understanding of the world around us and telling compelling stories. My technical background has also given me an interest in understanding the latest and greatest devOps tools making waves in the tech industry.
